column4: Is it normal for a slow computer to only do one task at a time.
500mhz 256mb ram and it can't handle more than one task at once
i launched open office like 6 minutes ago and its just now starting up
uh?....it should be able to handle more
but should be able to do more than one thing while doing it
how can i see if my hard drive is using dma/
and if its safe to turn it on
you could use XFCE to go nicer on your ram
no not all hard drives work nicely with linux dma
